page.title: 13CALLINGTON PRIVATE HOUSING
page.content: Recent private housing development comprises four new estates, The {Sycamores}sited opposide Moss Side with 70 homes and 26 self-build sites called{Highwood Park, Hazelwood,}lso off Tavistock Rd, which has 130 homes, and{Trelawney Rise }where 5 detached homes are under construction with plans for 15 more. The first 3 sites provide flats, terraced,semi-detached and detached houses and bungalows, all with gardens and garages or parking places. Most of the older Callington houses have undergone modernisation. There are a few scattered{guesthouses}in the town offering bed and breakfast accommodation. { At{St.Dominic Park Harrowbarrow, there are between 70 and 80 {residential mobile homes.}Most homes {in }the area are owner-occupied.
